name: Grinding Gears (MorganBowen)
description:
A deathly game of tag! Try and avoid your crazed opponent until time runs out with double jumps! Or outmanoeuvre you opponent and tag them!

Player 1:
Left = a
Right = d
Jump = c
Tag = v

Player 2:
Left = left arrow
Right = right arrow
Jump = .
Tag = ,

Group 22:

Bandit Sprites, Sven Thole, https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/bandits-pixel-art-104130

Tutorials:
